entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wreckhouse 1:30 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -11.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Wind Chill: -21
Wind: N 23 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 10 with temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 10 with temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023
